name: BLACK IS BEAUTIFUL
description:
Collage piece.
1080x1350

I always felt attracted to the history of the black panthers, the perseverance, the attitude, the convictions, the ideology, but one thing that caught my attention the most, the combination of ideology and style, this last one, became something super catchy, any black guy (even white guys too) wanted to go with a beret on his side, leather jacket, sunglasses and a rifle in hand on the street (protected by the law), it was something that they appropriated and made it part of them in a clear way, THIS IS US, and it is not something lightly, BLACK POWER, as the same phrase says, "there is no ethics without aesthetics", and it is not that they took that style just because, but they understood that to have firmness and consolidate they had to have something that defined them 100%, that they were recognized at first sight, they were proud to be black and with a lot of reason.
